sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Cookies from 'universal-cookie'; import { GetApartment } from '../../components/ApartmentManager/ApartmentManager'; function BookApartment() { const cookies = new Cookies(); let apartment = null; let checkin = null; let checkout = null; let diff = null; let years = null; let months = null; let days = null; try { apartment = GetApartment(cookies.get('book-apartment')); checkin = cookies.get('book-checkin'); checkout = cookies.get('book-checkout'); diff = Math.abs(strtotime(checkin) - strtotime(checkout)); years = Math.floor(diff / (365 * 60 * 60 * 24)); months = Math.floor((diff - years * 365 * 60 * 60 * 24) / (30 * 60 * 60 * 24)); days = years * 365; days += months * 30; days += Math.floor((diff - years * 365 * 60 * 60 * 24 - months * 30 * 60 * 60 * 24) / (60 * 60 * 24)); } catch (error) { window.location.replace('/'); } if (apartment === undefined) { window.location.replace('/'); } return (

) } export default BookApartment;
